meanings.definition: The state or quality of being similar to someone or something else.
meanings.sent1: There is a strong resemblance between the twins.
meanings.sent2: The resemblance between the two paintings is striking.
meanings.sent3: The resemblance between the two cats made everyone do a double-take.
meanings.sent4: The resemblance between the two stories was uncanny.
meanings.sent5: The resemblance between the two cars was so close, it was hard to tell them apart.

meanings.definition: A way in which two or more people or things are alike.
meanings.sent1: The resemblance in their taste in music brought them closer.
meanings.sent2: There is a resemblance in the way they walk.
meanings.sent3: The resemblance in their fashion sense was quite amusing.
meanings.sent4: The resemblance in their personalities was like finding a mirror.
meanings.sent5: The resemblance in their handwriting was so similar, it was eerie.
